entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 5.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Int'l Airport 06:00 AM PST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 5.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 88 %
Dewpoint: 3.8°C
Wind: NE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon except gusting to 60 near Haro Strait late this afternoon. High 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near Juan de Fuca Strait this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming light after midnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 09 February 2023
